official_title: A bill to provide combat bonuses for honorable Vietnam service through tax credits.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax credit for honorable active service as a member of the Armed Forces of the United States in a Vietnam combat zone. Sets the amount of such credit at $500 for taxable years ending after December 31, 1978, and beginning before January 1, 1982.
